package.name: seqdb-py
package.readme:
This tool (delete_seqdb_features) is packaged as part of seqdb-py distribution.
This dependency definition creates a virtual environment (virtualenv) and installs seqdb-py into the virtual environment directly from bitbucket.
Required Galaxy packages: python-devel
After the tool is installed, need to create a config.yaml with the local install information: - In the install directory (typically "install location"/venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages"), go to config directory - Rename config.yaml.sample to config.yaml - Modify config.yaml according to instruction inside
The tool can then be executed by running:
delete_seqdb_features
which is defined as an entry point to seqdb-py distribution and can be executed from any system location.
